text: @NYGovCuomo Your pathetic excuses passing the buck to others for the 10,000 nursing home deaths from COVID-19 don't hold water.  The blood of all these victims in on YOU, Cuomo. This should reduce NY's Medicaid burden to the elderly quite nicely. Just kill 'em off with a deadly disease.
